summary: Deploy and host the provided website exactly as-is (no modifications), ensure it works without warnings/errors, and provide the final live public URL.
architectural_notes: Deployment must preserve 100% of original project contents and folder hierarchy with no modifications, refactors, renames, or dependency/config changes.
After deployment, verify all pages/links/scripts/styles/media function correctly and do not expose warnings or errors.

new_feature_requests.summary: Deploy and host the provided website exactly as-is (no file/code/config changes) and share the final live public URL after verifying pages/assets work with no warnings/errors.

Deploy the existing project to the Internet Computer as-is (frontend static assets + backend canister) using the repositoryâ€™s current files, dependencies, configuration, and folder structure, and do not make any modifications to code, assets, configuration, or project structure as part of completing the deployment.

After deployment, verify the live site end-to-end: all routes/pages load, all navigation links work, scripts/styles load correctly, and all media/assets render without missing files; verify the browser DevTools Console shows no warnings or errors on initial load and during navigation.
After successful deployment and verification, provide the final live public URL for the hosted website as the only output (no additional text).

projectName: Deploy and host the existing website without modifying any project files
